content:
Sure, here are the challenges discussed by Carlos in the session in table form:

| # | Challenge |
| --- | --- |
| 1 | Tracking consumer identity across multiple data sets with different identifiers |
| 2 | Adapting to the post-cookie world and finding new ways to track consumers |
| 3 | Ensuring the accuracy and reliability of the identity graph |
| 4 | Managing and processing large amounts of data for the identity graph |
| 5 | Integrating data from various sources into the identity graph |
| 6 | Ensuring compliance with data security and privacy regulations |
| 7 | Balancing the need for personalization with the need for consumer privacy |
